properties.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:57AM PST until January 14 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
Another storm system will swing through the region and bring
multiple rounds of snow across Oregon and southern Washington this
afternoon through tomorrow.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 7 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY
